trans-unit.source: The Search module matches exact words, where a word is defined to be a sequence of characters delimited by spaces or punctuation. CJK languages are written in long strings of characters, though, not split up into words. So in order to allow search matching, we split up CJK text into tokens consisting of consecutive, overlapping sequences of characters whose length is equal to the 'minimum_word_size' variable. This tokenizing is only done if the 'overlap_cjk' variable is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 搜索模块可以匹配精确的单词,其中一个单词被定义为由空格或标点符号分隔的字符序列。不过中日韩语言是以长串字符书写的,而不是拆成单词。因此,为了允许搜索匹配,我们将中日韩文本分割成由连续、重叠的字符序列组成的标记,其长度等于 "最小字数 "变量。只有当 'overlap_cjk' 变量为 TRUE 时,才会进行这种标记化。

trans-unit.source: The Select query object we are extending/decorating.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在扩展/装饰的Select查询对象。

trans-unit.source: The Services and Dependency Injection Container concepts have been adopted by Drupal from the Symfony framework. A "service" (such as accessing the database, sending email, or translating user interface text) is defined (given a name and an interface or at least a class that defines the methods that may be called), and a default class is designated to provide the service. These two steps must be done together, and can be done by Drupal Core or a module. Other modules can then define alternative classes to provide the same services, overriding the default classes. Classes and functions that need to use the service should always instantiate the class via the dependency injection container (also known simply as the "container"), rather than instantiating a particular service provider class directly, so that they get the correct class (default or overridden).
trans-unit.target: Drupal已从Symfony框架中采用了服务和依赖注入容器的概念。定义了“服务”（例如访问数据库，发送电子邮件或翻译用户界面文本）（给定名称和界面，或者至少定义了可以调用的方法的类），并指定了默认类提供服务。这两个步骤必须一起完成，并且可以由Drupal Core或模块来完成。然后，其他模块可以定义替代类以提供相同的服务，从而覆盖默认类。需要使用服务的类和函数应始终通过依赖项注入容器（也称为“容器”）实例化该类，而不是直接实例化特定的服务提供者类，以便它们获得正确的类（默认值或覆盖）。

trans-unit.target: Set-Cookie响应头及其域属性在RFC 2109、RFC 2965和RFC 6265中都有定义,每一个都是上一个版本的叠加。

trans-unit.source: The URL generation process percent encodes non-alphanumeric characters. Thus, the only character within a URL that must be escaped in HTML is the ampersand ("&") which separates query params. Thus we cannot mark the generated URL as always safe, but only when we are sure there won't be multiple query params. This is the case when there are none or only one constant parameter given. For instance, we know beforehand this will not need to be escaped:

trans-unit.source: The actual loading is done through a class that has to implement the \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface interface. By default, \Drupal\Core\Entity\Sql\SqlContentEntityStorage is used for content entities and Drupal\Core\Config\Entity\ConfigEntityStorage for config entities. Entity types can specify that a different class should be used by setting the "handlers['storage']" key in the entity plugin annotation. These classes can either implement the \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface interface, or, most commonly, extend the \Drupal\Core\Entity\Sql\SqlContentEntityStorage class. See \Drupal\node\Entity\Node and \Drupal\node\NodeStorage for an example.

trans-unit.source: The basic entry point into the State API is \Drupal::state(), which returns an object of class \Drupal\Core\State\StateInterface. This class has methods for storing and retrieving state information; each piece of state information is associated with a string-valued key. Example:
trans-unit.target: State API的基本入口点是\ Drupal :: state（），它返回类\ Drupal \ Core \ State \ StateInterface的对象。此类具有用于存储和检索状态信息的方法。每个状态信息都与一个字符串值键相关联。例：

trans-unit.source: The basic idea of plugins is to allow a particular module or subsystem of Drupal to provide functionality in an extensible, object-oriented way. The controlling module or subsystem defines the basic framework (interface) for the functionality, and other modules can create plugins (implementing the interface) with particular behaviors. The controlling module instantiates existing plugins as needed, and calls methods to invoke their functionality. Examples of functionality in Drupal Core that use plugins include: the block system (block types are plugins), the entity/field system (entity types, field types, field formatters, and field widgets are plugins), the image manipulation system (image effects and image toolkits are plugins), and the search system (search page types are plugins).
trans-unit.target: 插件的基本思想是允许Drupal的一个特定模块或子系统以一种可扩展的、面向对象的方式提供功能。控制模块或子系统定义了功能的基本框架(接口),其他模块可以创建具有特定行为的插件(实现接口)。控制模块根据需要实例化现有的插件,并调用方法来调用它们的功能。Drupal Core中使用插件的功能实例包括:区块系统(区块类型是插件)、实体/字段系统(实体类型、字段类型、字段格式化和字段小部件是插件)、图像处理系统(图像效果和图像工具箱是插件)和搜索系统(搜索页面类型是插件)。

trans-unit.source: The batch process fetches the state of both local and (if configured) remote translation files. The data of the most recent translation is stored per per project and per language. This data is stored in a state variable 'locale.translation_status'. The timestamp it was last updated is stored in the state variable 'locale.translation_last_checked'.

trans-unit.source: The cache file name is retrieved on a page load via a lookup variable that contains an associative array. The array key is the hash of the file names in $css while the value is the cache file name. The cache file is generated in two cases. First, if there is no file name value for the key, which will happen if a new file name has been added to $css or after the lookup variable is emptied to force a rebuild of the cache. Second, the cache file is generated if it is missing on disk. Old cache files are not deleted immediately when the lookup variable is emptied, but are deleted after a configurable period (

trans-unit.source: The call order is as follows: all existing form alter functions are called for module A, then all for module B, etc., followed by all for any base theme(s), and finally for the theme itself. The module order is determined by system weight, then by module name.
trans-unit.target: 调用顺序如下:先调用模块A的所有现有表单更改函数,然后调用模块B的所有函数等,接着调用任何基本主题的所有函数,最后调用主题本身。模块顺序由系统权重决定,然后由模块名称决定。

trans-unit.source: The call order is as follows: all existing suggestion alter functions are called for module A, then all for module B, etc., followed by all for any base theme(s), and finally for the active theme. The order is determined by system weight, then by extension (module or theme) name.
trans-unit.target: 调用顺序如下:先调用模块A的所有现有建议更改函数,然后调用模块B的所有函数等,接着调用任何基本主题的所有函数,最后调用活动主题。顺序由系统权重决定,然后由扩展(模块或主题)名称决定。

trans-unit.source: The calls show values for scalar arguments and type names for complex ones.

trans-unit.source: The canonical representation is typically used when data is passed on to other code components. In many use cases, the TypedData object is mostly unified adapter wrapping a primary value (a string, an entity, etc.) which is the canonical representation that consuming code like constraint validators are really interested in. For some APIs, though, the domain object (for example, Field API's FieldItem and FieldItemList) directly implements TypedDataInterface, and the canonical representation is thus the data object itself.
trans-unit.target: 当数据被传递给其他代码组件时,通常会使用规范表示。在很多用例中,TypedData对象大多是统一的适配器,包装一个主值(一个字符串、一个实体等),这才是约束验证器等消费代码真正感兴趣的规范表示。不过对于一些API来说,域对象(例如Field API的FieldItem和FieldItemList)直接实现了TypedDataInterface,因此规范的表示就是数据对象本身。

trans-unit.source: The child elements of this element are sorted by weight using uasort() in \Drupal\Core\Render\Element::children(). Since this is expensive, when passing already sorted elements to Renderer::render(), for example from a database query, set $elements['#sorted'] = TRUE to avoid sorting them a second time.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的子元素使用\ Drupal \ Core \ Render \ Element :: children（）中的uasort（）按重量排序。由于这样做很昂贵，因此当将已排序的元素（例如从数据库查询）传递到Renderer :: render（）时，请设置$ elements ['＃sorted'] = TRUE以避免再次对其进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The class line either gives the default class that provides the service, or if the service uses a factory class, the interface for the service. If the class depends on other services, the arguments line lists the machine names of the dependencies (preceded by '@'); objects for each of these services are instantiated from the container and passed to the class constructor when the service class is instantiated. Other arguments can also be passed in; see the section at https://www.drupal.org/node/2133171 for more detailed information.
trans-unit.target: 类行提供提供服务的默认类，或者如果服务使用工厂类，则提供服务的接口。如果该类依赖于其他服务，则参数行会列出依赖项的计算机名称（以“ @”开头）；这些服务中的每一个的对象都从容器中实例化，并在实例化服务类时传递给类构造函数。其他参数也可以传入。有关更多详细信息，请参见https://www.drupal.org/node/2133171上的部分。

trans-unit.source: The condition is built exactly like SelectQuery or UpdateQuery conditions, the UPDATE query part is built similarly like an UpdateQuery and finally the INSERT query part is built similarly like an InsertQuery. However, both UpdateQuery and InsertQuery has a fields method so MergeQuery::updateFields() and MergeQuery::insertFields() needs to be called instead. MergeQuery::fields() can also be called which calls both of these methods as the common case is to use the same column-value pairs for both INSERT and UPDATE. However, this is not mandatory. Another convenient wrapper is MergeQuery::key() which adds the same column-value pairs to the condition and the INSERT query part.
trans-unit.target: 条件的构建与SelectQuery或UpdateQuery条件完全一样,UPDATE查询部分的构建与UpdateQuery类似,最后INSERT查询部分的构建与InsertQuery类似。但是,UpdateQuery和InsertQuery都有一个field方法,所以需要调用MergeQuery::updateFields()和MergeQuery::insertFields()来代替。MergeQuery::fields()也可以调用这两个方法,因为常见的情况是在INSERT和UPDATE中使用相同的列值对。然而,这不是强制性的。另一个方便的包装器是MergeQuery::key(),它将相同的列值对添加到条件和INSERT查询部分。

trans-unit.source: The constant definitions of this class correspond to the logging severity levels defined in RFC 5424, section 4.1.1. PHP supplies predefined LOG_* constants for use in the syslog() function, but their values on Windows builds do not correspond to RFC 5424. The associated PHP bug report was closed with the comment, "And it's also not a bug, as Windows just have less log levels," and "So the behavior you're seeing is perfectly normal."
trans-unit.target: 此类的常量定义与RFC 5424第4.1.1节中定义的日志记录严重性级别相对应。PHP提供了预定义的LOG_ *常量供syslog（）函数使用，但它们在Windows构建中的值与RFC 5424不对应。相关的PHP错误报告已关闭，并带有注释：“而且这也不是错误，因为Windows仅具有较少的日志级别”和“因此，您看到的行为是完全正常的。”

trans-unit.source: The core structure of the Render API is the render array, which is a hierarchical associative array containing data to be rendered and properties describing how the data should be rendered. A render array that is returned by a function to specify markup to be sent to the web browser or other services will eventually be rendered by a call to drupal_render(), which will recurse through the render array hierarchy if appropriate, making calls into the theme system to do the actual rendering. If a function or method actually needs to return rendered output rather than a render array, the best practice would be to create a render array, render it by calling drupal_render(), and return that result, rather than writing the markup directly. See the documentation of drupal_render() for more details of the rendering process.
trans-unit.target: Render API的核心结构是render数组，它是一个层次结构的关联数组，其中包含要渲染的数据和描述应如何渲染数据的属性。由函数返回以指定要发送给Web浏览器或其他服务的标记的渲染数组最终将通过调用drupal_render（）呈现，如果合适，它将在渲染数组层次结构中递归，从而调用主题系统做实际的渲染。如果函数或方法实际上需要返回渲染的输出而不是渲染数组，则最佳实践是创建一个渲染数组，通过调用drupal_render（）进行渲染，然后返回该结果，而不是直接编写标记。请参阅drupal_render的文档（）获取渲染过程的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The data is read from files named "$langcode.php" in PhpTransliteration::$dataDirectory. These files should set up an array variable $overrides with an element whose key is $langcode and whose value is an array whose keys are character codes, and whose values are their transliterations in this language. The character codes can be for any valid Unicode character, independent of the number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 数据是从PhpTransliteration::$dataDirectory中名为"$langcode.php "的文件中读取的。这些文件应该设置一个数组变量$overrides,其元素的键是$langcode,其值是一个数组,其键是字符代码,其值是它们在这种语言中的译名。字符代码可以是任何有效的Unicode字符,与字节数无关。

trans-unit.source: The data is read in from a file named "x$bank.php" (with $bank in hexadecimal notation) in PhpTransliteration::$dataDirectory. These files should set up a variable $bank containing an array whose numerical indices are the remaining two bytes of the character code, and whose values are the transliterations of these characters into US-ASCII. Note that the maximum Unicode character that can be encoded in this way is 4 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 数据是从PhpTransliteration::$dataDirectory中一个名为 "x$bank.php "的文件中读入的($bank用十六进制表示)。这些文件应该设置一个变量$bank,包含一个数组,其数值指数是剩余的两个字节的字符代码,其值是这些字符在US-ASCII中的翻译。请注意,以这种方式编码的Unicode字符最大为4个字节。

trans-unit.source: The database comes from two types of files, both of which are searched for in the PhpTransliteration::$dataDirectory directory. First, language-specific overrides are searched (see PhpTransliteration::readLanguageOverrides()). If there is no language-specific override for a character, the generic transliteration character tables are searched (see PhpTransliteration::readGenericData()). If looking up the character in the generic table results in a NULL value, or an illegal character is encountered, then a substitute character is returned.
trans-unit.target: 数据库来自两种类型的文件，都在PhpTransliteration :: $ dataDirectory目录中搜索这两种文件。首先，搜索特定于语言的替代（请参阅PhpTransliteration :: readLanguageOverrides（））。如果没有特定语言的字符替代，则搜索通用音译字符表（请参阅PhpTransliteration :: readGenericData（））。如果在通用表中查找字符会导致NULL值，或者遇到非法字符，则将返回替代字符。

trans-unit.source: The default entity access control handler invokes two hooks while checking access on a single entity: hook_entity_access() is invoked first, and then hook_ENTITY_TYPE_access() (where ENTITY_TYPE is the machine name of the entity type). If no module returns a TRUE or FALSE value from either of these hooks, then the entity's default access checking takes place. For create operations (creating a new entity), the hooks that are invoked are hook_entity_create_access() and hook_ENTITY_TYPE_create_access() instead.
trans-unit.target: 默认的实体访问控制处理程序在检查单个实体上的访问时会调用两个钩子：首先调用hook_entity_access（），然后调用hook_ENTITY_TYPE_access（）（其中ENTITY_TYPE是实体类型的机器名称）。如果没有模块从这两个挂钩中的任何一个返回TRUE或FALSE值，则将进行实体的默认访问检查。对于创建操作（创建新实体），调用的挂钩是hook_entity_create_access（）和hook_ENTITY_TYPE_create_access（）。

trans-unit.source: The default language must be provided without dependencies since it is both configured and a dependency of the configuration system. trans-unit.source: The elements of form arrays are divided up into properties (whose keys start with #) and children (whose keys do not start with #). The properties provide data or settings that are used in rendering and form processing. Some properties are specific to a particular type of form/render element, some are available for any render element, and some are available for any form input element. A list of the properties that are available for all form elements follows; see \Drupal\Core\Render\Element\RenderElement for some additional information, as well as a list of properties that are common to all render elements (including form elements). Properties specific to a particular element are documented on that element's class.
trans-unit.target: 表单数组的元素分为属性（其键以＃开头）和子级（其键不以＃开头）。这些属性提供在渲染和表单处理中使用的数据或设置。一些属性特定于特定类型的form / render元素，一些属性可用于任何render元素，某些属性可用于任何form input元素。以下是可用于所有表单元素的属性列表。有关某些其他信息，请参见\ Drupal \ Core \ Render \ Element \ RenderElement，以及所有渲染元素（包括表单元素）共有的属性列表。特定元素的特定属性记录在该元素的类上。

trans-unit.source: The elements of render arrays are divided up into properties (whose keys start with #) and children (whose keys do not start with #). The properties provide data or settings that are used in rendering. Some properties are specific to a particular type of render element, some are available for any render element, and some are available for any form input element. A list of the properties that are available for all render elements follows; the properties that are for all form elements are documented on \Drupal\Core\Render\Element\FormElement, and properties specific to a particular element are documented on that element's class. See the Render API topic for a list of the most commonly-used properties.
trans-unit.target: 渲染数组的元素分为属性（其键以＃开头）和子级（其键不以＃开头）。这些属性提供用于渲染的数据或设置。一些属性特定于某种类型的渲染元素，某些属性可用于任何渲染元素，而某些属性可用于任何表单输入元素。以下是可用于所有渲染元素的属性列表。所有表单元素的属性都记录在\ Drupal \ Core \ Render \ Element \ FormElement上，特定于特定元素的属性记录在该元素的类上。有关最常用属性的列表，请参见Render API主题。

trans-unit.source: The entity-type-specific hooks are represented in the list below as hook_ENTITY_TYPE_... (hook_ENTITY_TYPE_create() in this example). To implement one of these hooks for an entity whose machine name is "foo", define a function called mymodule_foo_create(), for instance. Also note that the entity or array of entities that are passed into a specific-type hook are of the specific entity class, not the generic Entity class, so in your implementation, you can make the $entity argument something like $node and give it a specific type hint (which should normally be to the specific interface, such as \Drupal\Node\NodeInterface for nodes).
trans-unit.target: 特定于实体类型的挂钩在下面的列表中表示为hook_ENTITY_TYPE _...（在此示例中为hook_ENTITY_TYPE_create（））。要为机器名称为“ foo”的实体实现这些挂钩之一，例如，定义一个名为mymodule_foo_create（）的函数。还要注意，传递到特定类型挂钩中的实体或实体数组属于特定的实体类，而不是通用的Entity类，因此在您的实现中，您可以使$ entity参数类似$ node并将其赋予特定类型的提示（通常应指向特定的接口，例如节点的\ Drupal \ Node \ NodeInterface）。

trans-unit.source: The file storage format for configuration information in Drupal is YAML files. Configuration is divided into files, each containing one configuration object. The file name for a configuration object is equal to the unique name of the configuration, with a '.yml' extension. The default configuration files for each module are placed in the config/install directory under the top-level module directory, so look there in most Core modules for examples.
trans-unit.target: Drupal中用于配置信息的文件存储格式是YAML文件。配置分为文件，每个文件包含一个配置对象。配置对象的文件名等于配置的唯一名称，后缀为'.yml'。每个模块的默认配置文件位于顶层模块目录下的config / install目录中，因此请在大多数Core模块中查找示例。

This is often prefixed by the module name if provided by a module; however, by convention some service names are prefixed by a group name instead, such as cache.* for cache bins and plugin.manager.* for plugin managers.

trans-unit.source: The first time render() or drupal_render() is called on an element tree, as each element in the tree is rendered, it is marked with a #printed flag and the rendered children of the element are cached. Subsequent calls to render() or drupal_render() will not traverse the child tree of this element again: they will just use the cached children. So if you want to hide an element, be sure to call hide() on the element before its parent tree is rendered for the first time, as it will have no effect on subsequent renderings of the parent tree.
trans-unit.target: 第一次在元素树上调用render（）或drupal_render（）时，将渲染树中的每个元素，并使用#printed标志对其进行标记，并缓存该元素的已渲染子元素。随后对render（）或drupal_render（）的调用将不会再次遍历此元素的子树：它们只会使用缓存的子级。因此，如果要隐藏元素，请确保在第一次渲染其父树之前在该元素上调用hide（），因为它不会对父树的后续渲染产生影响。

trans-unit.source: The first time render() or drupal_render() is called on an element tree, as each element in the tree is rendered, it is marked with a #printed flag and the rendered children of the element are cached. Subsequent calls to render() or drupal_render() will not traverse the child tree of this element again: they will just use the cached children. So if you want to show an element, be sure to call show() on the element before its parent tree is rendered for the first time, as it will have no effect on subsequent renderings of the parent tree.
trans-unit.target: 第一次在元素树上调用render（）或drupal_render（）时，将渲染树中的每个元素，并使用#printed标志对其进行标记，并缓存该元素的已渲染子元素。随后对render（）或drupal_render（）的调用将不会再次遍历此元素的子树：它们只会使用缓存的子级。因此，如果要显示元素，请确保在第一次渲染其父树之前在该元素上调用show（），因为它不会对父树的后续渲染产生影响。

trans-unit.source: The fourth argument of the set() method can be used to specify cache tags, which are used to identify which data is included in each cache item. A cache item can have multiple cache tags (an array of cache tags), and each cache tag is a string. The convention is to generate cache tags of the form [prefix]:[suffix]. Usually, you'll want to associate the cache tags of entities, or entity listings. You won't have to manually construct cache tags for them — just get their cache tags via \Drupal\Core\Cache\CacheableDependencyInterface::getCacheTags() and \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeInterface::getListCacheTags(). Data that has been tagged can be invalidated as a group: no matter the Cache ID (cid) of the cache item, no matter in which cache bin a cache item lives; as long as it is tagged with a certain cache tag, it will be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: set（）方法的第四个参数可用于指定缓存标记，这些缓存标记用于标识每个缓存项中包含哪些数据。一个缓存项可以具有多个缓存标签（缓存标签数组），并且每个缓存标签都是一个字符串。约定是生成格式为[prefix]：[suffix]的缓存标签。通常，您需要关联实体或实体列表的缓存标签。您不必手动为其构建缓存标签-只需通过\ Drupal \ Core \ Cache \ CacheableDependencyInterface :: getCacheTags（）和\ Drupal \ Core \ Entity \ EntityTypeInterface :: getListCacheTags获取它们的缓存标签（）。可以将已标记的数据作为一个组进行无效：无论缓存项的缓存ID（cid），无论缓存项位于哪个缓存箱中；只要使用特定的缓存标签对其进行标记，该标签就会失效。

trans-unit.source: The function logs in the user, records a watchdog message about the new session, saves the login timestamp, calls hook_user_login(), and generates a new session.
trans-unit.target: 该函数登录用户，记录有关新会话的监视消息，保存登录时间戳，调用hook_user_login（），并生成一个新会话。

trans-unit.source: The function operates by checking the view's display plugin to see if it has defined any contextual links that are intended to be displayed in the requested location; if so, it attaches them. The contextual links intended for a particular location are defined by the 'contextual links' and 'contextual_links_locations' properties in the plugin annotation; as a result, these hook implementations have full control over where and how contextual links are rendered for each display.
trans-unit.target: 该函数通过检查视图的显示插件来操作,看看它是否定义了任何打算在请求的位置显示的上下文链接;如果是,它就会将它们附加起来。特定位置的上下文链接由插件注解中的'contextual links'和'contextual_links_locations'属性定义;因此,这些钩子实现可以完全控制每个显示的上下文链接的位置和渲染方式。

trans-unit.source: The function reads the entity form display object from the current configuration, or returns a ready-to-use empty one if no configuration entry exists yet for this bundle and form mode. This streamlines manipulation of entity form displays by always returning a consistent object that reflects the current state of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该函数从当前配置中读取实体表格显示对象,如果该捆绑和表格模式还没有配置条目,则返回一个现成的空对象。这简化了对实体表格显示的操作,因为它总是返回一个反映当前配置状态的一致对象。

trans-unit.source: The function reads the entity view display from the current configuration, or returns a ready-to-use empty one if configuration entry exists yet for this bundle and view mode. This streamlines manipulation of display objects by always returning a consistent object that reflects the current state of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该函数从当前配置中读取实体视图显示,或者如果该捆绑和视图模式还存在配置条目,则返回一个现成的空显示。这简化了对显示对象的操作,总是返回一个反映当前配置状态的一致对象。

trans-unit.source: The function reads the rdf_mapping object from the current configuration, or returns a ready-to-use empty one if no configuration entry exists yet for this bundle. This streamlines the manipulation of mapping objects by always returning a consistent object that reflects the current state of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该函数从当前的配置中读取rdf_mapping对象,如果这个包还没有配置条目存在,则返回一个现成的空对象。这简化了对映射对象的操作,总是返回一个反映当前配置状态的一致对象。

trans-unit.source: The function serializes the body part of a \DOMDocument back to an (X)HTML snippet. The resulting (X)HTML snippet will be properly formatted to be compatible with HTML user agents.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将一个\DOMDocument的主体部分序列化为一个(X)HTML片段。生成的(X)HTML片段将被适当地格式化,以便与HTML用户代理兼容。

trans-unit.source: The function takes an entity and returns the label of the entity. Use language() on the entity to get information on the requested language. The entity label is the main string associated with an entity; for example, the title of a node or the subject of a comment. If there is an entity object property that defines the label, use the 'label' element of the 'entity_keys' return value component to provide this information. If more complex logic is needed to determine the label of an entity, you can instead specify a callback function here, which will be called to determine the entity label.
trans-unit.target: 该函数接收一个实体并返回该实体的标签。在实体上使用 language()来获取请求的语言信息。实体标签是与实体相关联的主要字符串;例如,节点的标题或评论的主题。如果有定义标签的实体对象属性,则使用'entity_keys'返回值组件的'label'元素来提供这个信息。如果需要更复杂的逻辑来确定一个实体的标签,可以在这里指定一个回调函数,该函数将被调用来确定实体标签。

trans-unit.source: The goal of this class is to ensure that if a PHP file is replaced with an untrusted one, it does not get loaded. Since mtime granularity is 1 second, we cannot prevent an attack that happens within one second of the initial save(). However, it is very unlikely for an attacker exploiting an upload or file write vulnerability to also know when a legitimate file is being saved, discover its hash, undo its file permissions, and override the file with an upload all within a single second. Being able to accomplish that would indicate a site very likely vulnerable to many other attack vectors.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的目标是确保如果一个PHP文件被替换成一个不受信任的文件,它不会被加载。由于mtime的粒度是1秒,所以我们无法防止在初始save()后一秒内发生的攻击。然而,对于利用上传或文件写入漏洞的攻击者来说,要想在一秒钟内也知道一个合法文件何时被保存,发现它的哈希值,撤销它的文件权限,并用上传覆盖该文件,是非常不可能的。能够做到这一点,就说明一个网站很可能会受到许多其他攻击载体的攻击。

trans-unit.source: The information_schema is a SQL standard that provides information about the database server and the databases, schemas, tables, columns and users within it. This makes information_schema a useful tool to use across the drupal database drivers and is used by a few different functions. The function below describes the conditions to be meet when querying information_schema.tables for drupal tables or information associated with drupal tables. Even though this is the standard method, not all databases follow standards and so this method should be overwritten by a database driver if the database provider uses alternate methods. Because information_schema.tables is used in a few different functions, a database driver will only need to override this function to make all the others work. For example see core/includes/databases/mysql/schema.inc.
trans-unit.target: information_schema是一个SQL标准,它提供了关于数据库服务器以及其中的数据库、模式、表、列和用户的信息。这使得information_schema成为一个有用的工具,在整个drupal数据库驱动中,它被一些不同的函数所使用。下面的函数描述了当查询information_schema.tables中的drupal表或与drupal表相关联的信息时需要满足的条件。尽管这是标准的方法,但并不是所有的数据库都遵循标准,所以如果数据库提供者使用其他方法,这个方法应该被数据库驱动覆盖。因为information_schema.tables被用在几个不同的函数中,所以数据库驱动只需要覆盖这个函数就可以让其他函数工作。例如参见core/includes/databases/mysql/schema.inc。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of Drupal's Theme system is to give themes complete control over the appearance of the site, which includes the markup returned from HTTP requests and the CSS files used to style that markup. In order to ensure that a theme can completely customize the markup, module developers should avoid directly writing HTML markup for pages, blocks, and other user-visible output in their modules, and instead return structured "render arrays" (see Render arrays below). Doing this also increases usability, by ensuring that the markup used for similar functionality on different areas of the site is the same, which gives users fewer user interface patterns to learn.
trans-unit.target: Drupal的主题系统的主要目的是使主题能够完全控制网站的外观，其中包括从HTTP请求返回的标记以及用于标记样式的CSS文件。为了确保主题可以完全自定义标记，模块开发人员应避免在其模块中直接为页面，块和其他用户可见的输出编写HTML标记，而应返回结构化的“渲染数组”（请参见下面的渲染数组）。 。通过确保在站点的不同区域上用于相似功能的标记相同，这样做还可以提高可用性，从而使用户学习的用户界面模式更少。

trans-unit.source: The markup that results from RendererInterface::renderRoot() is now the original HTML response's content, but with the placeholders rendered. We overwrite the existing content in the original HTML response object with this markup. The markup that was rendered for the placeholders may also have attachments (e.g. for CSS/JS assets) itself, and cacheability metadata that indicates what that markup depends on. That metadata is also added to the HTML response object.
trans-unit.target: 现在，由RendererInterface :: renderRoot（）生成的标记是原始HTML响应的内容，但带有占位符。我们使用此标记覆盖原始HTML响应对象中的现有内容。为占位符呈现的标记本身也可能具有附件（例如，对于CSS / JS资产），以及指示该标记所依赖的可缓存性元数据。该元数据也被添加到HTML响应对象中。

trans-unit.source: The metadata of a data object is defined by an object based on a class called the definition class (see \Drupal\Core\TypedData\DataDefinitionInterface). The class used can vary by data type and can be specified in the data type's plugin definition, while the default is set in the $definition_class property of the annotation class. The default class is \Drupal\Core\TypedData\DataDefinition. For data types provided by a plugin deriver, the plugin deriver can set the definition_class property too. The metadata object provides information about the data, such as the data type, whether it is translatable, the names of its properties (for complex types), and who can access it.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象的元数据由对象基于称为定义类的类定义（请参见\ Drupal \ Core \ TypedData \ DataDefinitionInterface）。所使用的类可能因数据类型而异，并且可以在数据类型的插件定义中指定，而默认值是在注释类的$ definition_class属性中设置的。默认类为\ Drupal \ Core \ TypedData \ DataDefinition。对于插件派生程序提供的数据类型，插件派生程序也可以设置definition_class属性。元数据对象提供有关数据的信息，例如数据类型，它是否可翻译，其属性名称（对于复杂类型）以及谁可以访问它。

trans-unit.source: The method flags constraint violations related to fields shown on the form as form errors on the correct form elements. Possibly pre-existing violations of hidden fields (so fields not appearing in the display) are ignored. Other, non-field related violations are passed through and set as form errors according to the property path of the violations.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将与表单上显示的字段相关的约束违反标记为正确表单元素的表单错误。可能存在的隐藏字段的违规行为(因此字段没有出现在显示中)会被忽略。其他与字段无关的违规行为将根据违规行为的属性路径被传递并设置为表单错误。

trans-unit.source: The module checks for available updates of Drupal core and any installed contributed modules and themes. It warns site administrators if newer releases are available via the system status report (admin/reports/status), the module and theme pages, and optionally via email. It also provides the ability to install contributed modules and themes via an user interface.
trans-unit.target: 该模块检查Drupal核心和任何已安装的贡献模块和主题的可用更新。它通过系统状态报告(admin/reports/status)、模块和主题页面,以及可选的电子邮件来警告网站管理员是否有更新版本。它还提供了通过用户界面安装贡献模块和主题的功能。

trans-unit.source: The primary use case for this Ajax command is to serve a new build ID to a form served from the cache to an anonymous user, preventing one anonymous user from accessing the form state of another anonymous user on Ajax enabled forms.
trans-unit.target: 该Ajax命令的主要用例是向从缓存中向匿名用户提供的表单提供一个新的构建ID,防止一个匿名用户访问另一个匿名用户在Ajax启用的表单上的表单状态。

trans-unit.source: The principle of internationalization is that it should be possible to make a Drupal site in any language (or a multi-lingual site), where only content in the desired language is displayed for any particular page request. In order to make this happen, developers of modules, themes, and installation profiles need to make sure that all of the displayable content and user interface (UI) text that their project deals with is internationalized properly, so that it can be translated using the standard Drupal translation mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 国际化的原则是,应该可以用任何语言制作Drupal网站(或多语言网站),在任何特定的页面请求中只显示所需语言的内容。为了实现这一点,模块、主题和安装配置文件的开发者需要确保他们的项目所涉及的所有可显示内容和用户界面(UI)文本都正确地进行了国际化,以便能够使用标准的Drupal翻译机制进行翻译。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this is to allow links to be logically grouped into related categories, so that each child group can be rendered as its own list of links if drupal_render() is called on it, but calling drupal_render() on the parent element will still produce a single list containing all the remaining links, regardless of what group they were in.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的目的是为了让链接在逻辑上划分为相关类别，使每个子组可以呈现为自己的链接列表中，如果drupal_render（）被调用就可以了，但调用drupal_render父元素（）仍然会产生一个包含所有其余链接的列表，无论它们属于哪个组。

trans-unit.source: The realms and grant IDs can be arbitrarily defined by your node access module; it is common to use role IDs as grant IDs, but that is not required. Your module could instead maintain its own list of users, where each list has an ID. In that case, the return value of this hook would be an array of the list IDs that this user is a member of.
trans-unit.target: 领域和授予ID可以由你的节点访问模块任意定义;通常使用角色ID作为授予ID,但这不是必需的。你的模块可以维护自己的用户列表,每个列表都有一个ID。在这种情况下,这个钩子的返回值将是这个用户是成员的列表ID的数组。
